                    }

                    "children": {
                        "doge": {
                            "children": {
                                "wow": {
                                    "added": "so much",

                                    "status": "changed"
                                }
                            },
                            "status": "nested"

                            "status": "added",
                            "value": "vops"
                        }
                    },
                    "status": "nested"

            "status": "nested"
        },

            "children": {
                "baz": {
                    "added": "bars",
                    "removed": "bas",

                    "status": "unchanged",

                    "added": "str",

                        "key": "value"
                    },
                    "status": "changed"
                }
            },
            "status": "nested"

            "value": {
                "abc": 12345,
                "deep": {
                    "id": 45
                }
            }

                    }
